name: Homeward Bound (KaitlinH)
description:
This game was made for the Miracle Team Game Jam and the Theme was Love Letter!

It missed submissions, but a lot of hard work went into this as our first ever game jam submission so I am posting it here anyway! 

Controls:

WASDMoveEInteractClickNavigate Text

Art and Game Made by Kaitlin Haughton (Me)

Music Made by Gina Loughlin- https://ginaloughlin.wixsite.com/composer

9pm update- fixed a few bugs and the music
